lines.text: You want to go on the stage, doncha?
I don't know whether I do or not.
lines.character: Gladys, aka Ella Beebee and Eve

lines.text: Has your name ever been on a marquee?

lines.character: Gladys, aka Ella Beebee and Eve

lines.text:
[Noticing a young, attractive hotel maid]
Say, girlie, I been watchin' you. What's a nice girl like you doing work like this for?
Oh, I'm only doing this temporary. I'm going to be a secretary as soon as I learn to spell better.
lines.character: Gladys, aka Ella Beebee and Eve

lines.text: Oh, you oughta' be on the stage!
I thought of that, too, but I never got around to it.
lines.character: Gladys, aka Ella Beebee and Eve
